explains: n. 触须，触角；<美>天线；感觉，直觉
wordGroup: receiving antenna n. 接收天线
slot antenna 缝隙天线；槽孔天线
community antenna television 电缆电视；公用天线电视
antenna beam 天线波束；天线射束
active antenna 有源天线；发射天线
loop antenna 回路天线；环形天线；框形天线

sentences.en: You'll need a good antenna to exploit the radio's performance.
sentences.cn: 你需要一根好的天线来充分利用该电台的节目。

sentences.en: Can you see the radio antenna on that hill?
sentences.cn: 你能看见那座山上的无线电天线吗？

sentences.en: They erected a television antenna on the roof.
sentences.cn: 他们在屋顶上架起了电视天线。
